reviewText: Awesome Bible study!  Would recommend it to anyone at any age.  The homework is short but very in depth.  Loved it!

God allowed me to lead a neighborhood group of ladies in this study as I have seen in my life the Person of the Holy Spirit speak to me, direct my footsteps, and guide me towards the Calling HE has for my life!! As a result, a new neighbor shared how she would like that level of faith and that began the neighborhood group!! God is All-Knowing and HE knew how lives would be Blessed and Transformed by this study in paticular :)
This Bible study is both basic and enlightening.  It helps Christians to look to God through His word for decision-making.  It is well organized and is a follow-up to Shirer's study. He Speaks to me.
